txt.en: Feeding, outfitting, and arming an entire army takes vast resources.
Goods and supplies can be found across Azanulbizar.\n\nValdi has tasked you with gathering meat, furs, and supplies for the army.
'You have done much to help the cause. Our victory will be in part due to your efforts.'
Assist in gathering supplies for the army

'So, you have come to assist the war effort? We certainly could use the help, and everyone is expected to pitch in. There are numerous tasks that need doing. Assist the others where you can, and lighten the burden where you may.'
Valdi can be found in Amd√¢n.\n\nYou should return to Valdi.
